page.title: 06Entertainment in Upton.
page.content: Residents and visitors to Upton have a comprehensive choice of entertainment.{SPORTS and GAMES.}"The Conway Castle" Steamer at the Marina takes parties for river trips. Passengers can wine and dine en route. There are Angling, Archery, Badminton, Sports, Cricket and pigeon_flying Clubs. The local Croome Hint meet from time to time near Upton and there is a Hunt Supporters Club. Point_to_Point Races are held annually.{MUSIC and the ARTS.}The Pepperpot Players perform two plays a year and a Pantomime. The St. Nicholas Singers give Concerts in the Memorial Hall, local Churches etc. Upton Arts Society organise Musical evenings, concerts, organ recitals and literary events also some outings. Discos, Gardening Club and Lectures are held at the Memorial Hall.
